AtomNode.trailing: -- Enforce naming conventions for index variables.

CommandDoccommentNode.comment: Given a list `is` of monotonically increasing indices into `l`, getting each index produces a sublist of `l`. -/

AtomNode.val: Given a list `is` of monotonically increasing indices into `l`, getting each index produces a sublist of `l`. -/

OtherNode.state_before: α : Type u_1 l : List α is : List (Fin l.length) h : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) is ⊢ map (fun x => l[x]) is <+ l
OtherNode.state_after: α : Type u_1 l : List α is : List (Fin l.length) h : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) is ⊢ ∀ (j : Nat) (l' : List α), l' = drop j l → (∀ (i : Fin l.length), i ∈ is → j ≤ ↑i) → map (fun x => l[x]) is <+ l'
OtherNode.tactic: suffices ∀ j l', l' = l.drop j → (∀ i ∈ is, j ≤ i) → map (l[·]) is <+ l' from this 0 l (by simp) (by simp)

OtherNode.state_before: α : Type u_1 l : List α is : List (Fin l.length) h : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) is this : ∀ (j : Nat) (l' : List α), l' = drop j l → (∀ (i : Fin l.length), i ∈ is → j ≤ ↑i) → map (fun x => l[x]) is <+ l' ⊢ l = drop 0 l
OtherNode.state_after: no goals

OtherNode.state_before: α : Type u_1 l : List α is : List (Fin l.length) h : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) is this : ∀ (j : Nat) (l' : List α), l' = drop j l → (∀ (i : Fin l.length), i ∈ is → j ≤ ↑i) → map (fun x => l[x]) is <+ l' ⊢ ∀ (i : Fin l.length), i ∈ is → 0 ≤ ↑i
OtherNode.state_after: no goals

OtherNode.state_before: α : Type u_1 l : List α is : List (Fin l.length) h : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) is ⊢ ∀ (j : Nat) (l' : List α), l' = drop j l → (∀ (i : Fin l.length), i ∈ is → j ≤ ↑i) → map (fun x => l[x]) is <+ l'
OtherNode.state_after: α : Type u_1 l : List α is : List (Fin l.length) h : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) is j : Nat his : ∀ (i : Fin l.length), i ∈ is → j ≤ ↑i ⊢ map (fun x => l[x]) is <+ drop j l

OtherNode.state_before: α : Type u_1 l : List α is : List (Fin l.length) h : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) is j : Nat his : ∀ (i : Fin l.length), i ∈ is → j ≤ ↑i ⊢ map (fun x => l[x]) is <+ drop j l
OtherNode.state_after: no goals
OtherNode.tactic: induction is generalizing j with | nil => simp | cons hd tl IH => simp only [Fin.getElem_fin, map_cons] have := IH h.of_cons (hd+1) (pairwise_cons.mp h).1 specialize his hd (.head _) have := (drop_eq_getElem_cons ..).symm ▸ this.cons₂ (get l hd) have := Sublist.append (nil_sublist (take hd l |>.drop j)) this rwa [nil_append, ← (drop_append_of_le_length ?_), take_append_drop] at this simp [Nat.min_eq_left (Nat.le_of_lt hd.isLt), his]

OtherNode.state_before: case nil α : Type u_1 l : List α h : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) [] j : Nat his : ∀ (i : Fin l.length), i ∈ [] → j ≤ ↑i ⊢ map (fun x => l[x]) [] <+ drop j l
OtherNode.state_after: no goals

OtherNode.state_before: case cons α : Type u_1 l : List α hd : Fin l.length tl : List (Fin l.length) IH : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) tl → ∀ (j : Nat), (∀ (i : Fin l.length), i ∈ tl → j ≤ ↑i) → map (fun x => l[x]) tl <+ drop j l h : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) (hd :: tl) j : Nat his : ∀ (i : Fin l.length), i ∈ hd :: tl → j ≤ ↑i ⊢ map (fun x => l[x]) (hd :: tl) <+ drop j l
OtherNode.state_after: case cons α : Type u_1 l : List α hd : Fin l.length tl : List (Fin l.length) IH : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) tl → ∀ (j : Nat), (∀ (i : Fin l.length), i ∈ tl → j ≤ ↑i) → map (fun x => l[x]) tl <+ drop j l h : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) (hd :: tl) j : Nat his : ∀ (i : Fin l.length), i ∈ hd :: tl → j ≤ ↑i ⊢ l[↑hd] :: map (fun x => l[↑x]) tl <+ drop j l

OtherNode.state_before: case cons α : Type u_1 l : List α hd : Fin l.length tl : List (Fin l.length) IH : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) tl → ∀ (j : Nat), (∀ (i : Fin l.length), i ∈ tl → j ≤ ↑i) → map (fun x => l[x]) tl <+ drop j l h : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) (hd :: tl) j : Nat his : ∀ (i : Fin l.length), i ∈ hd :: tl → j ≤ ↑i ⊢ l[↑hd] :: map (fun x => l[↑x]) tl <+ drop j l
OtherNode.state_after: case cons α : Type u_1 l : List α hd : Fin l.length tl : List (Fin l.length) IH : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) tl → ∀ (j : Nat), (∀ (i : Fin l.length), i ∈ tl → j ≤ ↑i) → map (fun x => l[x]) tl <+ drop j l h : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) (hd :: tl) j : Nat his : ∀ (i : Fin l.length), i ∈ hd :: tl → j ≤ ↑i this : map (fun x => l[x]) tl <+ drop (↑hd + 1) l ⊢ l[↑hd] :: map (fun x => l[↑x]) tl <+ drop j l

OtherNode.state_before: case cons α : Type u_1 l : List α hd : Fin l.length tl : List (Fin l.length) IH : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) tl → ∀ (j : Nat), (∀ (i : Fin l.length), i ∈ tl → j ≤ ↑i) → map (fun x => l[x]) tl <+ drop j l h : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) (hd :: tl) j : Nat his : ∀ (i : Fin l.length), i ∈ hd :: tl → j ≤ ↑i this : map (fun x => l[x]) tl <+ drop (↑hd + 1) l ⊢ l[↑hd] :: map (fun x => l[↑x]) tl <+ drop j l
OtherNode.state_after: case cons α : Type u_1 l : List α hd : Fin l.length tl : List (Fin l.length) IH : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) tl → ∀ (j : Nat), (∀ (i : Fin l.length), i ∈ tl → j ≤ ↑i) → map (fun x => l[x]) tl <+ drop j l h : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) (hd :: tl) j : Nat this : map (fun x => l[x]) tl <+ drop (↑hd + 1) l his : j ≤ ↑hd ⊢ l[↑hd] :: map (fun x => l[↑x]) tl <+ drop j l

OtherNode.state_before: case cons α : Type u_1 l : List α hd : Fin l.length tl : List (Fin l.length) IH : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) tl → ∀ (j : Nat), (∀ (i : Fin l.length), i ∈ tl → j ≤ ↑i) → map (fun x => l[x]) tl <+ drop j l h : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) (hd :: tl) j : Nat this : map (fun x => l[x]) tl <+ drop (↑hd + 1) l his : j ≤ ↑hd ⊢ l[↑hd] :: map (fun x => l[↑x]) tl <+ drop j l
OtherNode.state_after: case cons α : Type u_1 l : List α hd : Fin l.length tl : List (Fin l.length) IH : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) tl → ∀ (j : Nat), (∀ (i : Fin l.length), i ∈ tl → j ≤ ↑i) → map (fun x => l[x]) tl <+ drop j l h : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) (hd :: tl) j : Nat this✝ : map (fun x => l[x]) tl <+ drop (↑hd + 1) l his : j ≤ ↑hd this : l.get hd :: map (fun x => l[x]) tl <+ drop (↑hd) l ⊢ l[↑hd] :: map (fun x => l[↑x]) tl <+ drop j l

OtherNode.state_before: case cons α : Type u_1 l : List α hd : Fin l.length tl : List (Fin l.length) IH : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) tl → ∀ (j : Nat), (∀ (i : Fin l.length), i ∈ tl → j ≤ ↑i) → map (fun x => l[x]) tl <+ drop j l h : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) (hd :: tl) j : Nat this✝ : map (fun x => l[x]) tl <+ drop (↑hd + 1) l his : j ≤ ↑hd this : l.get hd :: map (fun x => l[x]) tl <+ drop (↑hd) l ⊢ l[↑hd] :: map (fun x => l[↑x]) tl <+ drop j l
OtherNode.state_after: case cons α : Type u_1 l : List α hd : Fin l.length tl : List (Fin l.length) IH : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) tl → ∀ (j : Nat), (∀ (i : Fin l.length), i ∈ tl → j ≤ ↑i) → map (fun x => l[x]) tl <+ drop j l h : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) (hd :: tl) j : Nat this✝¹ : map (fun x => l[x]) tl <+ drop (↑hd + 1) l his : j ≤ ↑hd this✝ : l.get hd :: map (fun x => l[x]) tl <+ drop (↑hd) l this : [] ++ l.get hd :: map (fun x => l[x]) tl <+ drop j (take (↑hd) l) ++ drop (↑hd) l ⊢ l[↑hd] :: map (fun x => l[↑x]) tl <+ drop j l
OtherNode.tactic: have := Sublist.append (nil_sublist (take hd l |>.drop j)) this

OtherNode.state_before: case cons α : Type u_1 l : List α hd : Fin l.length tl : List (Fin l.length) IH : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) tl → ∀ (j : Nat), (∀ (i : Fin l.length), i ∈ tl → j ≤ ↑i) → map (fun x => l[x]) tl <+ drop j l h : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) (hd :: tl) j : Nat this✝¹ : map (fun x => l[x]) tl <+ drop (↑hd + 1) l his : j ≤ ↑hd this✝ : l.get hd :: map (fun x => l[x]) tl <+ drop (↑hd) l this : [] ++ l.get hd :: map (fun x => l[x]) tl <+ drop j (take (↑hd) l) ++ drop (↑hd) l ⊢ l[↑hd] :: map (fun x => l[↑x]) tl <+ drop j l

OtherNode.state_before: α : Type u_1 l : List α hd : Fin l.length tl : List (Fin l.length) IH : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) tl → ∀ (j : Nat), (∀ (i : Fin l.length), i ∈ tl → j ≤ ↑i) → map (fun x => l[x]) tl <+ drop j l h : Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) (hd :: tl) j : Nat this✝¹ : map (fun x => l[x]) tl <+ drop (↑hd + 1) l his : j ≤ ↑hd this✝ : l.get hd :: map (fun x => l[x]) tl <+ drop (↑hd) l this : l.get hd :: map (fun x => l[x]) tl <+ drop j (take (↑hd) l) ++ drop (↑hd) l ⊢ j ≤ (take (↑hd) l).length
OtherNode.state_after: no goals

CommandDoccommentNode.comment: Given a sublist `l' <+ l`, there exists an increasing list of indices `is` such that `l' = is.map fun i => l[i]`. -/

AtomNode.val: Given a sublist `l' <+ l`, there exists an increasing list of indices `is` such that `l' = is.map fun i => l[i]`. -/

OtherNode.state_before: α : Type u_1 l l' : List α h : l' <+ l ⊢ ∃ is, l' = map (fun x => l[x]) is ∧ Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) is
OtherNode.state_after: no goals
OtherNode.tactic: induction h with | slnil => exact ⟨[], by simp⟩ | cons _ _ IH => let ⟨is, IH⟩ := IH refine ⟨is.map (·.succ), ?_⟩ simpa [Function.comp_def, pairwise_map] | cons₂ _ _ IH => rcases IH with ⟨is,IH⟩ refine ⟨⟨0, by simp [Nat.zero_lt_succ]⟩ :: is.map (·.succ), ?_⟩ simp [Function.comp_def, pairwise_map, IH, ← get_eq_getElem, get_cons_zero, get_cons_succ']

OtherNode.state_before: case slnil α : Type u_1 l l' : List α ⊢ ∃ is, [] = map (fun x => [][x]) is ∧ Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) is
OtherNode.state_after: no goals

OtherNode.state_before: α : Type u_1 l l' : List α ⊢ [] = map (fun x => [][x]) [] ∧ Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) []
OtherNode.state_after: no goals

OtherNode.state_before: case cons α : Type u_1 l l' l₁✝ l₂✝ : List α a✝¹ : α a✝ : l₁✝ <+ l₂✝ IH : ∃ is, l₁✝ = map (fun x => l₂✝[x]) is ∧ Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) is ⊢ ∃ is, l₁✝ = map (fun x => (a✝¹ :: l₂✝)[x]) is ∧ Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) is
OtherNode.state_after: case cons α : Type u_1 l l' l₁✝ l₂✝ : List α a✝¹ : α a✝ : l₁✝ <+ l₂✝ IH✝ : ∃ is, l₁✝ = map (fun x => l₂✝[x]) is ∧ Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) is is : List (Fin l₂✝.length) IH : l₁✝ = map (fun x => l₂✝[x]) is ∧ Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) is ⊢ ∃ is, l₁✝ = map (fun x => (a✝¹ :: l₂✝)[x]) is ∧ Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) is

OtherNode.state_before: case cons α : Type u_1 l l' l₁✝ l₂✝ : List α a✝¹ : α a✝ : l₁✝ <+ l₂✝ IH✝ : ∃ is, l₁✝ = map (fun x => l₂✝[x]) is ∧ Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) is is : List (Fin l₂✝.length) IH : l₁✝ = map (fun x => l₂✝[x]) is ∧ Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) is ⊢ ∃ is, l₁✝ = map (fun x => (a✝¹ :: l₂✝)[x]) is ∧ Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) is
OtherNode.state_after: case cons α : Type u_1 l l' l₁✝ l₂✝ : List α a✝¹ : α a✝ : l₁✝ <+ l₂✝ IH✝ : ∃ is, l₁✝ = map (fun x => l₂✝[x]) is ∧ Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) is is : List (Fin l₂✝.length) IH : l₁✝ = map (fun x => l₂✝[x]) is ∧ Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) is ⊢ l₁✝ = map (fun x => (a✝¹ :: l₂✝)[x]) (map (fun x => x.succ) is) ∧ Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) (map (fun x => x.succ) is)

OtherNode.state_before: case cons α : Type u_1 l l' l₁✝ l₂✝ : List α a✝¹ : α a✝ : l₁✝ <+ l₂✝ IH✝ : ∃ is, l₁✝ = map (fun x => l₂✝[x]) is ∧ Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) is is : List (Fin l₂✝.length) IH : l₁✝ = map (fun x => l₂✝[x]) is ∧ Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) is ⊢ l₁✝ = map (fun x => (a✝¹ :: l₂✝)[x]) (map (fun x => x.succ) is) ∧ Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) (map (fun x => x.succ) is)
OtherNode.state_after: no goals

OtherNode.state_before: case cons₂ α : Type u_1 l l' l₁✝ l₂✝ : List α a✝¹ : α a✝ : l₁✝ <+ l₂✝ IH : ∃ is, l₁✝ = map (fun x => l₂✝[x]) is ∧ Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) is ⊢ ∃ is, a✝¹ :: l₁✝ = map (fun x => (a✝¹ :: l₂✝)[x]) is ∧ Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) is
OtherNode.state_after: case cons₂.intro α : Type u_1 l l' l₁✝ l₂✝ : List α a✝¹ : α a✝ : l₁✝ <+ l₂✝ is : List (Fin l₂✝.length) IH : l₁✝ = map (fun x => l₂✝[x]) is ∧ Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) is ⊢ ∃ is, a✝¹ :: l₁✝ = map (fun x => (a✝¹ :: l₂✝)[x]) is ∧ Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) is

OtherNode.state_before: case cons₂.intro α : Type u_1 l l' l₁✝ l₂✝ : List α a✝¹ : α a✝ : l₁✝ <+ l₂✝ is : List (Fin l₂✝.length) IH : l₁✝ = map (fun x => l₂✝[x]) is ∧ Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) is ⊢ ∃ is, a✝¹ :: l₁✝ = map (fun x => (a✝¹ :: l₂✝)[x]) is ∧ Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) is
OtherNode.state_after: case cons₂.intro α : Type u_1 l l' l₁✝ l₂✝ : List α a✝¹ : α a✝ : l₁✝ <+ l₂✝ is : List (Fin l₂✝.length) IH : l₁✝ = map (fun x => l₂✝[x]) is ∧ Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) is ⊢ a✝¹ :: l₁✝ = map (fun x => (a✝¹ :: l₂✝)[x]) (⟨0, ⋯⟩ :: map (fun x => x.succ) is) ∧ Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) (⟨0, ⋯⟩ :: map (fun x => x.succ) is)

OtherNode.state_before: α : Type u_1 l l' l₁✝ l₂✝ : List α a✝¹ : α a✝ : l₁✝ <+ l₂✝ is : List (Fin l₂✝.length) IH : l₁✝ = map (fun x => l₂✝[x]) is ∧ Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) is ⊢ 0 < (a✝¹ :: l₂✝).length
OtherNode.state_after: no goals

OtherNode.state_before: case cons₂.intro α : Type u_1 l l' l₁✝ l₂✝ : List α a✝¹ : α a✝ : l₁✝ <+ l₂✝ is : List (Fin l₂✝.length) IH : l₁✝ = map (fun x => l₂✝[x]) is ∧ Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) is ⊢ a✝¹ :: l₁✝ = map (fun x => (a✝¹ :: l₂✝)[x]) (⟨0, ⋯⟩ :: map (fun x => x.succ) is) ∧ Pairwise (fun x1 x2 => x1 < x2) (⟨0, ⋯⟩ :: map (fun x => x.succ) is)
OtherNode.state_after: no goals
OtherNode.tactic: simp [Function.comp_def, pairwise_map, IH, ← get_eq_getElem, get_cons_zero, get_cons_succ']

OtherNode.state_before: α✝ : Type u_1 R : α✝ → α✝ → Prop l : List α✝ ⊢ Pairwise R l ↔ ∀ (i j : Nat) (_hi : i < l.length) (_hj : j < l.length), i < j → R l[i] l[j]
OtherNode.state_after: α✝ : Type u_1 R : α✝ → α✝ → Prop l : List α✝ ⊢ (∀ {a b : α✝}, [a, b] <+ l → R a b) ↔ ∀ (i j : Nat) (_hi : i < l.length) (_hj : j < l.length), i < j → R l[i] l[j]

OtherNode.state_before: α✝ : Type u_1 R : α✝ → α✝ → Prop l : List α✝ ⊢ (∀ {a b : α✝}, [a, b] <+ l → R a b) ↔ ∀ (i j : Nat) (_hi : i < l.length) (_hj : j < l.length), i < j → R l[i] l[j]
OtherNode.state_after:
case mp α✝ : Type u_1 R : α✝ → α✝ → Prop l : List α✝ h : ∀ {a b : α✝}, [a, b] <+ l → R a b ⊢ ∀ (i j : Nat) (_hi : i < l.length) (_hj : j < l.length), i < j → R l[i] l[j]
case mpr α✝ : Type u_1 R : α✝ → α✝ → Prop l : List α✝ h : ∀ (i j : Nat) (_hi : i < l.length) (_hj : j < l.length), i < j → R l[i] l[j] ⊢ ∀ {a b : α✝}, [a, b] <+ l → R a b

OtherNode.state_before:
case mp α✝ : Type u_1 R : α✝ → α✝ → Prop l : List α✝ h : ∀ {a b : α✝}, [a, b] <+ l → R a b ⊢ ∀ (i j : Nat) (_hi : i < l.length) (_hj : j < l.length), i < j → R l[i] l[j]
case mpr α✝ : Type u_1 R : α✝ → α✝ → Prop l : List α✝ h : ∀ (i j : Nat) (_hi : i < l.length) (_hj : j < l.length), i < j → R l[i] l[j] ⊢ ∀ {a b : α✝}, [a, b] <+ l → R a b
OtherNode.state_after: case mpr α✝ : Type u_1 R : α✝ → α✝ → Prop l : List α✝ h : ∀ (i j : Nat) (_hi : i < l.length) (_hj : j < l.length), i < j → R l[i] l[j] ⊢ ∀ {a b : α✝}, [a, b] <+ l → R a b
OtherNode.tactic: · intros i j hi hj h' apply h simpa [h'] using map_getElem_sublist (is := [⟨i, hi⟩, ⟨j, hj⟩])

OtherNode.state_before: case mp α✝ : Type u_1 R : α✝ → α✝ → Prop l : List α✝ h : ∀ {a b : α✝}, [a, b] <+ l → R a b ⊢ ∀ (i j : Nat) (_hi : i < l.length) (_hj : j < l.length), i < j → R l[i] l[j]
OtherNode.state_after: case mp α✝ : Type u_1 R : α✝ → α✝ → Prop l : List α✝ h : ∀ {a b : α✝}, [a, b] <+ l → R a b i j : Nat hi : i < l.length hj : j < l.length h' : i < j ⊢ R l[i] l[j]
OtherNode.tactic: intros i j hi hj h'

Comment.text: -- Enforce naming conventions for index variables.
Given a list `is` of monotonically increasing indices into `l`, getting each index produces a sublist of `l`. -/
Given a sublist `l' <+ l`, there exists an increasing list of indices `is` such that `l' = is.map fun i => l[i]`. -/
